brand.title: Brand Introduction
brand.subSlogan: Making every day a shining moment.
brand.description: Glossy Matcha promises to grow not just as a brand selling matcha, but as a Relational Brand filled with Diverse Emotions and Content that make every moment of people's lives Shine.

subContents.title: Relax with Glossy
subContents.subTitle: "Glossy Matcha offers you true relaxation"
contents: Glossy Matcha uses only the Highest Quality 100% Organic Matcha grown in Jeju.
Experience True Relaxation with Glossy Matcha, capturing the Fresh Vitality of Jeju’s Pristine Nature.

cafe.title: Cafe Introduction
cafe.subSlogan: The Hottest Spot in the East of Jeju
cafe.description: At 112 Johamhaean-ro, Jocheon-eup, Jeju Special Self-Governing Province, enjoy drinks and desserts made with the Finest Jeju-Grown Matcha while taking in the Beautiful Ocean View and Peaceful Atmosphere.

subContents.title: Enjoy Matcha
subContents.subTitle: "Organic Matcha Enjoyed in Jeju"
contents: Jeju’s Hills, Straight Matcha, Glossy Matcha Mojito, Ang Matcha Butter Toast, Barley Cream Matcha Latte, and more.
Discover a variety of Matcha Menu Items exclusive to Cafe Glossy Matcha.

product.title: Product Introduction
product.subSlogan: The Perfect Sweetness blended with Natural and Alternative Sugars
product.description: Following Traditional Processing Methods passed down from ancestors, Glossy Matcha reduces bitterness and offers a Delicate, Smooth and Clean Finish, making it enjoyable even for beginners.

subContents.title: Ease to use, Glossy
subContents.subTitle: "From Glossy Matcha Signature to Tea Sets"
contents: The possibilities are endless with a single pack of Glossy Matcha Signature, made from the First New Leaves of Jeju’s Early Spring.
Enjoy Matcha Straight, Matcha Latte, Lemonade, and more ─ all from the comfort of your home.

test.title: Matcha Test
test.subSlogan: The One and Only Glossy Matcha ─ Just For You
test.description: Matcha Straight? Matcha Mojito? Matcha Latte? Find the Matcha Menu that suits you and enjoy it at Glossy Matcha!

subContents.title: Find your matcha
subContents.subTitle: "Looking For a Recommended Menu?"
contents: It’s not easy to find a menu that fits your Mood and Taste today.
We'll recommend the Perfect Choice tailored to your Preferences.

inquire.title: Contact Us
inquire.description:
If you have any questions, please feel free to reach out.
Our team will respond promptly via email.

alertMessage.invaild: Please fill out all the fields.
alertMessage.success: Your inquiry has been received. We will reply to your email as soon as we check it!
alertMessage.fail: Failed to submit the inquiry. Please try again.

intro.title: LIFE WITH GLOSSY
intro.slogan: We make every day a Shining Moment.

description.paragraph-1: Glossy Matcha provides Sparkling Energy for everyone, helping them find their own Joy and Happiness, and making every moment of their lives shine.
description.paragraph-2: Glossy Matcha promises to grow into a Relational Brand filled with Diverse Emotions and content ─ not just a brand that sells matcha, but one that brightens Everyday life.
description.paragraph-3: At Glossy Matcha, we help you discover the sparkle in life's Everyday Moments, starting with the little things we share together.
description.paragraph-4: Our genuine products, engaging content, and thoughtful campaigns are designed to be part of your daily life, fostering Sustainable Coexistence.

item-1.title: LIGHT
item-1.desc: We pursue the shining moments of Jeju and everyday life.

item-2.title: NATURAL
item-2.desc: We constantly seek and research ways to live in harmony with nature.

item-3.title: TRAVEL
item-3.desc: We offer a lifestyle that can be enjoyed alongside travel.

intro.title: RELAX WITH GLOSSY
intro.slogan: Glossy Matcha gifts you true relaxation.

description.paragraph-1: Matcha is the Finest Tea from Jeju. Glossy Matcha uses only 100% Organic Matcha of the Highest Quality.
description.paragraph-2: It captures the Vibrant Green Vitality created by Jeju's pristine nature. The Calming Green Aroma offers comfort and relaxation to all.
description.paragraph-3: The unique Sweet yet Rich Aroma of matcha is a harmonious blend of Freshness and Gentle Bitterness.
description.paragraph-4: Fill your body and mind with Health and the Refreshing Spirit of Green.

item-1.title: Organic First Flush Leaves
item-1.description: Made from 100% Organic First Flush Tea Leaves grown in Seogwipo Eco Farm, delivering a Smoother and Richer Taste.

item-2.title: Sustainable Future
item-2.description: We collaborate with Local Farmers and Artisans who care for the Environment, moving toward a healthier and more Sustainable Future.

item-3.title: Commitment to Quality
item-3.description: Through Processing Techniques and Distribution Management backed by years of expertise, we produce matcha of the Highest Quality.

desc: Achieved $20,000 export record for the year (including GLOSSY MATCHA products)
Participated in 2025 SIRHA (Salon International de la Restauration, de l'Hôtellerie et de l'Alimentation)
Held Pop-Up Events in the USA and France and discussed follow-Up export volumes
Planned release of Lifestyle Shoe Collaboration Products (with Muleboy, green matcha color slippers)

header.title: Glossy Pick
header.sub-title: The one and only, Your personalized Glossy Matcha

intro.desc: Answer a few questions and We'll recommend the Glossy Matcha Menu that suits you.
